ModMetaData.name: Alpha Genes
ModMetaData.author: Allie, Erin, Major Quadrangle, Matsay, Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new genes and xenotypes to Rimworld.
<size=24>Features</size>
- More than 250 new genes. Some are very low impact, while some are truly game changing. - 16 new xenotypes with wild mechanics. - A new "Custom random" xenotype that allows you to make new player created xenotypes, and have them loaded into two new custom factions. - Abandoned Biotech labs quests, similar to the ones in VE Genetics, that give access to all the new genes during play. - Genetic tools that allow you to tweak your colonists' genes. Obtainable through lab quests or normal quest rewards.
<size=24>Issues</size>
No issues known at the moment
<size=24>Plans for the future</size>
Oh you can bet I will add new things!
<size=24>Changelog</size>
Full changelog on GitHub
